gurmukhi: ੳੁਤਮ ਮਧਿਮ ਅਰੁ ਅਧਮ ਤ੍ਰਿਬਿਧਿ ਜਗੁ ਅਾਪਨੋ ਸੁਅੰਨੁ ਕਾਹੂ ਬੁਰੋ ਤੳੁ ਨ ਲਾਗਿ ਹੈ
transliteration: Outam Madhim Aru Adham Tribidhi Jagu , Aapano Suannu Kaahoo Buro Tau N Laagi Hai ?
translation: Just as no category of society, high, middle or low class considers their son bad or evil,

gurmukhi: ਸਭ ਕੋੳੂ ਬਨਜੁ ਕਰਤ ਲਾਭ ਲਭਤ ਕੳੁ ਅਾਪਨੋ ਬਿੳੁਹਾਰੁ ਭਲੋ ਜਾਨਿ ਅਨਰਾਗਿ ਹੈ
transliteration: Sabh Kooo Banaju Karat Laabh Labhat Kau , Aapano Biuhaaru Bhalo Jaani Anaraagi Hai ?
translation: Just as everyone do business in order to earn profit, but they all consider their own profession to be the best and therefore love it,

gurmukhi: ਤੈਸੇ ਅਪਨੇ ਅਪਨੇ ੲਿਸਟੈ ਚਾਹਤ ਸਭੈ ਅਪਨੇ ਪਹਰੇ ਸਭ ਜਗਤੁ ਸੁਜਾਗਿ ਹੈ
transliteration: Taisay Apanay Apanay Isatai Chaahat Sabhai , Apanay Paharay Sabh Jagatu Sujaagi Hai ?
translation: Similarly everyone respect and love their own deity and in their life-time, are ever ready and conscious of worshipping him,

gurmukhi: ਸੁਅੰਨੁ ਸਮਰਥ ਭੲੇ ਬਨਜੁ ਬਿਕਾਨੇ ਜਾਨੈ ੲਿਸਟ ਪ੍ਰਤਾਪੁ ਅੰਤਿਕਾਲਿ ਅਗ੍ਰਭਾਗਿ ਹੈ ||੫੫੨||
transliteration: Suannu Samarad Bhaay Banaju Bikaanay Jaanai , Isat Prataapu Antikaali Agrabhaagi Hai ?552?
translation: Just as a son when grown up understands the art of business and trading and acquires proficiency, similarly on receiving initiation from the True Guru, a devoted disciple learns that the knowledge, ambrosial name blessed by the True Guru is capable of lib
